text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ugh… I don't need this. They're all here, look…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Folks from back home. I told them it was just 
a little school event, no big deal, y'know? Well, 
they all made the trip up here anyway…!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
And who's that they're sat next to? All the local 
folks from the neighborhood here! And they're 
all getting on like a house on fire!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Getting all excited over little old me… I tell you, it's like 
some kind of family reunion up there!
choice_data_list: So instead of two fan clubs, now you've got one big one!
So instead of two fan clubs, now you've got one big one!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: T… trainer-san! Come on, not you too!?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ngaah! Just stop it with the expectations already!

But once it came time for Nice Nature to line up in the starting 
gates, her expression was very different…
The big race was about to begin…!
(Bang!!)

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Ha, hah, ha, haa…!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
They're rounding the first corner now and it's Nice Nature in 4th 
position, but all eyes are on Tokai Teio, a length behind in 5th…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
(Ugh, I really could do without all this pressure. Look at her, I 
bet she doesn't even know the meaning of the word…)

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: (But it's alright… it's all going to plan so far…)

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Heh. See ya later!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
And Tokai Teio makes her move, she 
powers to the front of the pack…!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Uuh…!?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
(Crap! Teio's hitting out already! If I let her get a gap now, 
I'm never bringing her back…)

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Gaaah…!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Nice nature breaks away from the group and takes off in pursuit 
as they round the last corner!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
It's still Tokai Teio, Tokai Teio leads with Nice Nature in 3rd, 
she's giving it everything to try and bridge the gap…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Hah, ha, hah…! Aaaaaaaghh!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Tokai Teio leads by 2 lengths… 2½… 3 lengths now and she is HOME!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: It's another commanding victory for Tokai Teio!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ha, hah, ha… aaah—

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Hahaa… I was pretty close there, wasn't I?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: And hey! 3rd place isn't a bad result! Can't complain, right?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
You know, I think it's actually just right for me! Not nothing, 
but not a big deal either. Kind of suits me, right?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Yeah. Yeah, this is pretty much what I'm capable of.

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text: Sorry to interrupt. Is Nature-san here?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Oh, uh, yeah. Can I help you with something?

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text: I've got a delivery for you. I'll just put it down here.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh…?

The teacher placed a large box on the table. It was packed to 
bursting with letters… fan letters, all addressed to Nice Nature.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: "Dear Nay-chan,"

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
"We know you gave it everything in todays race. 
It's a shame you couldn't finish first, but seeing 
you fight so hard is an inspiration."

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: "You bring smiles to all of us even though you aren't here…"

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
"To know a wonderful Uma Musume like you is a privilege and we 
will treasure it forever."

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: "We will always cheer for you! Stay healthy,"

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I don't… what is…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
What are they talking about? "Inspiration"? 
Me? But… but I didn't…
choice_data_list: You're a hero to a lot of people, you know.
You're a hero to a lot of people, you know.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ngaaaah! Aaaaagh! AAAAAA!!!!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Shit! Shit shit shit shit AAAAAAAGH!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Third place, what the hell is that! Every GOD DAMN time!!!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ohhhh, I ran a good race, did I!? Good hustle, huh!? Better luck 
next time!? I'm not just going to stand here and accept that 
that's all I've got. I won't do it!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
God, and just listen to me… trying to style it out like third 
place is alright really. Pretending it doesn't hurt to lose EVERY 
SINGLE TIME. I'm an embarrassment.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Telling people not to have faith in me… because I don't want to 
let everyone down, you know…? I don't want to let myself down!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: But… but… but come on…!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I don't want this to be all there is!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Those people support me… they cheer for me, 
they look to me for inspriation. Me!!!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
So I have to do it for them. I have to give them what they want 
to see. I have to shine… I have to win!
choice_data_list: I've been waiting to hear you say that.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san…
choice_data_list: From now on, we're racing for 1st place.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ah, yeah, uh… what I mean is… ugh…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, it's no good, is it? I've got to 
stop trying to hedge all the time.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Sorry for not giving you a straight "yes". I guess… I'm not brave 
enough to say that sort of thing out loud just yet.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But… umm… you know. If you say you 
want to… like… go for it, then…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Okay. Let's do it, trainer-san!
